entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.4°C

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
